overview: “EMERALD” IS AN EXPERIMENTAL VIDEO THAT FOLLOWING A PROCESS THAT WE HAVE DEVELOPED USING PAINTS, OIL AND SOAP.  You will appreciate the small balls rolling under your eyes.  All were filmed in 4K with a lens 100mm Macro from CANON  Welcome in colorful universe : wearecolorful.net@gmail.com  wearecolorful.net  Music by Velvet Coffee : Facebook : facebook.com/velvetcoffeemusic/?fref=ts  Souncloud : soundcloud.com/velvetcoffee/tracks  Directors: Oilhack  oilhack.org/  Thomas blanchard  thomas-blanchard.com
title: Emerald
